description.value:
Hellknights are disciplined individuals who seek to maintain order and quell chaos. The myriad Hellknight orders are all highly structured and regimented. This template gives a low-level creature significantly more treasure than the normal maximum for its level, due to expensive armor; adjust the total treasure in your adventure accordingly.

All Creatures: Add the lawful trait. Remove the chaotic trait.
1st Level or Higher: Remove the creature's armor (if any) from its items. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6AhDKX1dwRwFpQsU]{Splint Mail} to the creature's items. If the creature wasn't wearing heavy armor before this adjustment, its Speed is reduced by 5 feet and it gains +1 AC.
4th Level or Higher: The creature gains resistance to mental and slashing equal to half its level.
7th Level or Higher: Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.lCgXeV52eYYl5cUX]{Hellknight Plate} to the creature's items instead of splint mail. The creature can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uNsliWpl8Q1JdFcM]{Discern Lies} once per day as an innate divine spell.
12th Level or Higher: Remove one of the creature's reactions (if any) from its available options, and replace it with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.W7SbTykXrNwxDzJc]{Reactive Strike}. If applying the 1st-level template ability caused the creature's Speed to be reduced, that Speed is now restored to its original value.
17th Level or Higher: The creature's attacks deal 1d6 additional lawful damage on a hit. As is normal for aligned damage, this damages only chaotic creatures.
